rotate_and_press_lid_in_sequence.description: Rotate the lid of the kitchen pot first, then press it.

press_lid_and_then_clean.description: Press the lid and then wipe it clean.

wipe_and_rotate_lid.description: Wipe the lid clean and then rotate it.

polish_lid.description: Polish the lid of the kitchen pot.

rotate_and_press_lid.description: Rotate the lid of the kitchen pot and then press it.

press_and_wiggle_lid.description: Apply pressure on the lid of the kitchen pot and wiggle it back and forth.

clean_and_press_lid.description: Clean the lid of the kitchen pot and then press it.

press_on_lid.description: Apply pressure on the lid of the kitchen pot.

rotate_lid.description: Rotate the lid of the kitchen pot.

clean_lid.description: Clean the lid of the kitchen pot.

press_lid.description: Press the lid of the kitchen pot.

lift_up_lid.description: Lift up the lid of the kitchen pot.

cap_lid.description: Cap the kitchen pot with the lid.

clean_pot_body.description: Wipe the body of the kitchen pot to clean it.

press_lid_and_clean_pot.description: Press the lid and then wipe the pot clean.

polish_pot_body.description: Polish the body of the kitchen pot.

clean_and_press_pot.description: Clean the body of the kitchen pot and then press it.

clean_and_wiggle_pot.description: Clean the body of the kitchen pot and then wiggle it back and forth.

wipe_pot.description: Wipe the body of the kitchen pot.

place_lid.description: Place the lid back on the kitchen pot.

clean_pot.description: Clean the body of the kitchen pot.

place_lid_on_pot.description: Place the lid on the pot.

wipe_pot_body.description: Wipe the body of the kitchen pot to clean it.

rotate_and_press_lid_then_clean_whole_po.description: Rotate and press the lid, then clean the entire pot, including the lid.

clean_lid_and_pot_then_press_lid.description: Clean the lid and body of the pot, then press the lid.

rotate_lid_then_clean_whole_pot.description: Rotate the lid of the pot first, then clean the whole pot including the lid and body.

press_lid_then_wipe_and_rotate_lid.description: Press the lid of the pot first, then wipe and rotate it.

rotate_lid_then_wipe_lid_and_pot_body.description: Rotate the lid of the pot first, then wipe the lid and the pot body.

polish_whole_pot.description: Polish the whole pot including the lid and the body.

rotate_lid_add_pressure.description: Rotate the lid of the kitchen pot and then add pressure.

polish_pot_with_rotated_lid.description: Rotate the lid of the pot, polish the lid, and polish the body of the pot.

press_and_clean_lid.description: Apply pressure on the lid of the kitchen pot and then clean it.

clean_and_press_whole_pot.description: Clean the whole pot including the lid and the body, and then press the lid.

clean_and_wiggle_whole_pot.description: Clean the whole pot including the lid and the body, and then wiggle the lid back and forth.

press_and_rotate_lid.description: Apply pressure on the lid and then rotate it.

wipe_and_place_lid.description: Wipe the lid, place it back on the pot, and then wipe the entire pot.

clean_whole_pot.description: Clean the whole pot including the lid and the body.

tidy_up_pot.description: Place the lid on pot and then clean the whole pot.

uncap_lid.description: Uncap the kitchen pot by removing the lid.

tidy_up_kitchen_pot.description: First, uncap the kitchen pot, clean the pot body and the lid, then put the lid back onto the pot.

clean_and_store_pot.description: Clean the entire kitchen pot including the lid and the pot body, then store the lid back onto the pot.
